title: User Registration with valid data
description: Ensure a new user can register with valid details, receives free credits, and receives confirmation email

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Input valid user details (email, password, name)
Submit the registration form
Verify registration is successful and user is created in database
Verify user account starts with free credits
Verify confirmation email is received

title: User Login with correct credentials
description: Verify that user can log in successfully with correct credentials and redirected to dashboard

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid email and password
Submit login form
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to user dashboard

title: Login failure with incorrect credentials
description: Verify system prevents login with invalid credentials and shows proper error message

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid email or password
Submit login form
Verify login fails and proper error message 'invalid credentials' is displayed

title: Password recovery process
description: Verify user can trigger password recovery and reset password via received email link

steps.description: Navigate to forgot password page
Enter registered email address and submit
Verify password recovery email is sent
Click password reset link in email
Input new valid password and confirm
Verify password has been successfully reset and login with new password works

title: Document Upload with valid supported file
description: Verify user can upload legal document files in supported formats and see them listed for analysis

steps.description: Log in and navigate to document upload page
Upload supported legal document file (e.g. PDF, DOCX)
Verify file is accepted and visible in document list for analysis
Verify automatic validation confirms file format and content correctness

title: Text input document analysis initiation
description: Validate that user can input legal document text manually and initiate AI analysis

steps.description: Navigate to text input document analysis page
Paste or type valid legal document text
Select AI provider (OpenAI, Anthropic, or Google Gemini)
Select appropriate Brazilian law template for analysis
Submit for analysis
Verify credit deduction matches expected cost
Verify AI analysis completes successfully and results are displayed

title: AI analysis accuracy with different providers
description: Verify that the AI analysis results are correctly returned and relevant for each AI provider across document types

steps.description: Upload or input document text
Select AI provider: OpenAI GPT-5
Start analysis and wait for results
Verify analysis is accurate and includes risk identification and improvement suggestions
Repeat above steps selecting Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4
Verify similar output quality and correctness
Repeat above steps selecting Google Gemini 2.5 Pro
Verify AI output meets product standard for accuracy and relevance

title: Batch document processing with queue and progress tracking
description: Verify user can upload and submit a batch of documents, monitor queue status, and receive individual results

steps.description: Log in and navigate to batch processing page
Upload multiple documents (mixed valid and invalid formats)
Verify documents with invalid formats are flagged with error
Submit valid documents for batch analysis
Verify batch queue shows correct status and progress for each document
Verify each document's analysis completes correctly with individual results

title: Credit deduction and payment handling via Stripe
description: Ensure credits are deducted properly after each analysis and payments can be made through Stripe with plan selection

steps.description: Perform multiple document analyses to consume credits
Verify credit balance updates correctly after each analysis
Navigate to billing/checkout page
Select a subscription plan
Make payment through Stripe payment gateway
Verify payment is processed successfully and credits are added correctly
Verify transaction history shows correct details

title: Administrative dashboard user management and analytics
description: Validate admin user can view, modify user roles, and see system analytics correctly

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to admin dashboard
Verify user list is displayed with roles and statuses
Change a user's role and save changes
Verify role change persists and user privileges update accordingly
Verify system analytics (usage stats, payment reports) are visible and accurate

title: Customer support ticket creation and messaging
description: Verify users can create support tickets, send and receive messages with real-time updates

steps.description: Log in and navigate to support ticket page
Create a new support ticket with subject and detailed description
Verify ticket is created and visible in user's ticket list
Send a message in the created ticket
Verify message appears immediately and is acknowledged by support agent
Verify ticket priority can be set and updated

title: Landing page displays correct product and pricing details
description: Validate landing page loads and displays accurate product descriptions, features, pricing, and authentication options

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page URL
Verify landing page contains product overview and core features
Verify pricing plans and payment options are displayed
Verify login and registration links/buttons are present and functional

title: Dashboard analytics and recent analyses display
description: Verify that after login the dashboard presents analytics widgets, recent documents, and quick action buttons correctly

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the dashboard
Verify analytics are accurate and up to date
Verify recent analyses list shows correct documents and statuses
Verify quick action buttons for new analysis, profile, and billing are present and functional

title: Profile update and account management
description: Verify user can edit profile details, change password, and update billing information

steps.description: Log in and navigate to profile management page
Update profile information (name, contact details)
Submit changes and verify update success notification
Change password with valid current and new passwords
Verify password change is successful

title: Soft delete (trash) management with recovery
description: Verify that deleted document analyses go to trash and can be restored or permanently deleted

steps.description: Delete a document analysis from the list
Verify document analysis moves to trash folder
Navigate to trash management page
Restore deleted document analysis
Verify analysis is restored to original list and accessible
Delete an analysis permanently from trash
Verify analysis is removed permanently and not accessible

title: Email notification system with SMTP integration
description: Verify system sends emails for registration, password recovery, payment receipts, and support ticket updates correctly

steps.description: Trigger user registration and verify confirmation email sent
Trigger password recovery email
Verify email contents, subject and links are correct
Trigger payment processing and verify payment receipt email
Trigger support ticket creation and reply notification emails
Verify all emails are delivered and comply with privacy policy

title: Data encryption at rest and in transit
description: Verify sensitive data is encrypted in storage and transmitted securely through the platform

steps.description: Save sensitive user data (passwords, payment info, document contents)
Verify data is encrypted in the database (at rest)
Perform data transmission actions (login, document upload, payment)
Verify data is transmitted over HTTPS with valid TLS

title: API endpoints comprehensive coverage
description: Test all RESTful API endpoints for authentication, analyses, users, batch processing, and admin functions with valid and invalid data

steps.description: Authenticate user with valid and invalid tokens
Verify access control and appropriate error responses
Call document analysis API with valid and invalid inputs
Verify correct response, validation errors, and error handling
Call batch processing APIs to submit, monitor, and cancel batches
Verify status updates and correct queue behavior
Call admin APIs for user management and analytics
Verify permissions and data accuracy

title: UI responsiveness and accessibility
description: Verify user interface is responsive across devices and accessible per WCAG standards on landing, dashboard, upload, and support pages

steps.description: Test UI layouts on mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes
Verify elements resize and reposition correctly without overlappings
Use keyboard navigation and screen reader on key pages
Verify all interactive elements are reachable and labeled correctly

title: Error handling and system uptime monitoring
description: Ensure system gracefully handles errors with user-friendly messages and maintains uptime > 99.9%

steps.description: Induce API failure scenarios (network timeout, service unavailable)
Verify error messages are informative and do not expose sensitive info
Simulate high load/batch queue overflow
Verify system maintains availability and user operations are queued or rate limited properly
